TopicTitle: So the kraken is a glitch?

Articles.Content:
The only kraken model i ever seen is the dead one that serve as easter egg but all bat**** crazy that happen on spacecraft is just a game glitch?

i wouldn't mind to be call it kraken cause it really look like kraken attack them but do you think Squad should add the real one in game to attack the player just like what creeper do in minecraft?

deep space monster, something like this but i wouldn't like it to ruin my space station and space base either.

idk.........i just release what am i thinking, how about your?
Just read the wiki article and you'll know: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Kraken
